experience.description: 1) Automation of Account Reconciliation.To understand the reconciliation process and identify areas of improvement to provide necessary suggestions to “Automate reconciliation”.To increase the “Auto-knock off” of the process for Reconciliation in Collection and Disbursal. 2) Direct Debit Mandate roll out for Rural.To initiate “Direct Debit Mandate” roll out for Rural pockets with SBI and BOB so to cater NACH mandate rejections.To enable process-improvement for NACH registration rejection and suggesting scope of improvement in the process
